L7p:Comment.stringValue: === Required changes can be implemented in policies in the 'Customizations' folder
=== The policies within that folder will have the same name as this policy but
=== either prefixed with '#' or suffixed with 'Extensions'
=== Prefixed policies can be used to overwrite variables of this policy
=== Suffixed policies can be used to extend functionality
=== If you find you cannot add your customizations using the policies in the 'Customizations' folder
=== please contact CA APIM Support so we can improve customization capability
This policy should be used as an encapsulated assertion
OTK has error responses configured that are specified here
OTK policies pass in an error code and this encapsulated assertion will return appropriate errors

L7p:value.stringValue: remember if a value if cache
remember if a value if cache
no or multiple access_token were provided
resource owner denied access to resources

L7p:Detail.stringValue: no parameters or duplicate parameters or a missing required parameters
jwks/jwk_uri should not be empty when using "private_key_jwt" or "self_signed_tls_client_auth" auth method.
The number of requests has exceeded the accepted limit
either an invalid code_challenge or code_challenge_method

L7p:value.stringValue: JWT - id_token could not be created
Max number of OAuth Sessions reached
// public key hash could not be created
// request_uri does not match registered request_uris
// request object signature is not verified
// request object response type does not match request parameter
// request object client_id does not match request parameter
// request object nonce does not match request parameter
// jwt cannot be processed before nbf
// both jwks and jwks_uri are provided at OIDC registration
// client jwt for client authentication is invalid
// replay attack protection could not be applied
// Jwks with x5c field is required for self signed mTLS
// Exactly one PKI parameter is required for pki mTLS
// request object iss claim is not client_id

L7p:Detail.stringValue: One or more post_logout_redirect_uris values are invalid.
One or more post_logout_redirect_uris values are invalid.

L7p:value.stringValue: // jwt cannot be processed before nbf (ciba)
// request object signature is not verified (ciba)

L7p:Detail.stringValue: An unknown or empty error code was given: Given: API-Prefix: '${apiPrefix}', error code: '${givenErrorCode}'. Setting it to '000'

L7p:value.stringValue: set to '000' since none was given
the given error code is not handled
